legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: 担任中国驻美大使八年有余，我将于本周离任回国。代表我的国家出使美国是我毕生荣耀，非常感谢多年来为我履职提供大力支持的各位朋友。回国在即，我将带走在美多年的美好回忆和各位给予我的友谊。中美都是伟大的国家，希望我们能以长远和战略眼光看待中美关系，为我们共同的未来继续努力。

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: After serving as Chinese Ambassador to the US for over 8 years, I will be leaving my post and returning to China this week. It's an honor of a lifetime to represent my country in the US. I want to thank everyone who has supported my performance of duties over the years.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: When I go back, I will take with me fond memories of my time in America & the friendship that many of you have given to me. Both China and the US are great nations. It's my hope that we will take a long-term & strategic view of our relations & work for our shared future together.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: So many people are lining up to bid farewell to Yuan Longping, father of hybrid rice, guardian of China’s food security. Getting countless people out of hunger, he will always rest in the hearts of the Chinese people. https://t.co/Wl5qhRGPbe

legacy.full_text:
#Xinjiang people have the best say about their life. 
In today's "Xinjiang is a wonderful land" meeting, several Xinjiang residents shared their real life and work experiences with us.  https://t.co/oHEew48MxO https://t.co/0bCRJQL6J3

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text:
#Xinjiang is a wonderful land.
Today I'm glad to join my colleagues from Xinjiang to present this wonderful land online.
For over 4 years, no single terrorist attack has happened there. Local economic &social development is thriving.
This is a best rebuttal to lies about Xinjiang https://t.co/RkDChaG0Yk

legacy.full_text:
China will honor its commitments on climate and it's helping other developing countries build capacity. 

We also hope to work with the entire int'l community, including the US, to jointly advance global environmental governance and build a community of life for man & Nature. https://t.co/4WtZhMQTE8

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: President Xi: China welcomes the United States' return to the multilateral climate governance process. China looks forward to working with the international community including the US to jointly advance global environmental governance. https://t.co/krl3supCed

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: President Xi: We should protect Nature and preserve the environment like we protect our eyes, and endeavor to foster a new relationship where man and Nature can both prosper and live in harmony. https://t.co/krl3supCed

legacy.full_text: At the invitation of U.S. President Joe Biden, Chinese President #XiJinping will attend and deliver an important speech at the Leaders Summit on Climate in Beijing on April 22 through videolink https://t.co/Q0ZTnZZyCe https://t.co/cyT8pvZBoT

Climate change is a challenge that must be tackled with seriousness and urgency. 

China is doing its best. 

We hope that all stakeholders will work together for full and effective implementation of the Paris Agreement and for better governance on climate.

legacy.full_text:
50 years ago, Ping Pong diplomacy created a unique way of interactions btw China and the US, though we may have far greater differences back then than now.

I believe today, we are in a better position to put aside differences & achieve win-win cooperation.https://t.co/7jTYvmSfOO

legacy.name: Liu Pengyu 刘鹏宇

legacy.full_text:
A year ago today, Wuhan ended a 76-day lockdown.

Now, the city’s cherry blossom is welcoming heroes who fought for her. 

Coming out of quarantine, I was excited to see the cherry blossom in DMV.

Vaccination is speeding up, and hope is spreading.

Take care & enjoy the spring. https://t.co/s0JKtcb3b5
Meet our new spokesperson.
